name: Relaxing on Hammock
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 10

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.3-0.7. (I used 0.5)

  • Keys: relaxing_on_hammock, surrounded_by_water, surrounded_by_beach

Works better with anime.

This model has been trained mostly on not squared images, mostly larger then higher, so i tryied to generate images with larger width has it should be but i didn't find a checkpoint that didn't distort faces in this case. So i'm posting all images with a small hammock in 512x768. If you find a good prompt for larger images with bigger hammocks i invite you to post them with data for the others.

keywords "surrounded" just select the environment where she/he is relaxing on hammock.

There is also surrounded_by_green if you want to try but it seem that everything becomes green, i had probably to use another keyword.

Enjoy!

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians

meta.prompt:
<lora:betterCuteAsian03:0.3>, woman,(relaxing_on_hammock,surrounded_by_water:1.3),
good hand,4k, high-res, masterpiece, best quality, head:1.3,((Hasselblad photography)), finely detailed skin, sharp focus, (cinematic lighting), collarbone, night, soft lighting, dynamic angle, [:(detailed face:1.2):0.2], outside,      <lora:relaxing_on_hammock:0.5>
meta.negativePrompt:
NG_DeepNagetive_V1_75T,(greyscale:1.2),
paintings, sketches, (worst quality:2), (low quality:2), (normal quality:2), lowres, normal quality, ((monochrome)), ((grayscale)), skin spots, acnes, skin blemishes, age spot, glans
